transcript:
Customer: Hello.



Hello.
Executive: Ji, main Abhishek Patil baat kar raha hun Pocket Store se.
Customer: Haan bol rahe hain.
Executive: Abhishek ji, Vikas baat kar raha tha main IndiaMART head office se baat kar raha tha. Aapne hamare service care number pe call kiya tha, right?
Customer: Haan, call kiya tha.
Executive: Ji, ji. Concern bata dijiye mujhe sir.
Customer: Abhi main jo buy now jo jab karta hun to mera number show nahi hota hai. Aapko dusra koi number show ho raha hai.
Executive: Ji, ji. Wo IndiaMART ka unique number show hota hai jo aapko mila hua hai, right? Unique number hi show hoga kyunki buyer jab aapko call karenge na, wo hamare paas se hoke guzarta hai call taaki hum maan lijiye kabhi kuch cases hote hain na sir fraud vagera ke, to yahan se sab hoke guzarte hain.
Executive: To isiliye wo unique number show ho raha hai aapka. Wo call un tak ja rahi hai.
Customer: Abhi aap usko mera number kyun nahi hoga?
Executive: Ji, usko aap jab connect karenge to message ke through apna number share kar sakte hain. Right? Kyunki saari jo leads hoti hain wo filtered hoke jaati hain na sir, to isiliye jo aap call karte ho to aapka number na unique number show hota hai IndiaMART ka jo keval aapko mila rehta hai.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi. Abhi main bol raha hun jab main jab main aap customer ko main buy now karke message bhejta hun tab main wahi number bheju ya mera number daal ke wo bheju?
Executive: Jab unse baat hone lage kyunki dekhiye customer kaise aap pe trust karega, right? Wo mainly IndiaMART pe trust kar raha hai buyer, right? To aap apna number usko message ke through baad mein jab contact hone lage, baat hone lage tab aap usko apna number bhej sakte ho.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai na? To isi ke regarding ye aapka tha. PNS number agar aapko dekhna bhi ho na sir, to aap desktop se operate karte ho ya phone pe operate karte ho apne panel ko?
Customer: Phone se desktop se dono se.
Executive: Achcha. To desktop se main aapko bata deta hun. Setting ke option mein jaoge jab aap, theek hai? Wahan pe PNS call setting ek third option pe aayega aapka. Wahan pe jo upar number rakha rehta hai na preferred number, wahi number aapka unique number hota hai jo aapko mila hota hai. Aur aapko sir ek kaam aur karna chahiye, theek hai? Aap agar abhi station pe ho to main aapko ek Google Meet ka link share karta hun. Wahan pe main aapko dikhaunga jo buyers jab aapko connect karte hain na, to aapko kaun sa number show hoga wo number aap pehle se pre-save karke rakhe raho apne paas. Taaki jo bhi customer call kare aapke paas udhar se apne side se, unko pata chale ki haan aapko lage ki haan IndiaMART ke buyer ka hi phone hai. Kyunki aapke bhi kuch offline buyer honge, right? To mix match na ho. At best aap number save karke rakhe raho.
Customer: Theek hai na? Ji. Taaki koi bhi phone karega to aapke knowledge mein rahega haan IndiaMART se call aaya to mujhe pick karna chahiye. Nahi to waise aap confuse ho jaate ho jaate hoge number save nahi rehta hoga to.
Customer: Haan wahi. Ek ek hi number tak ka show karega.
Executive: Agar aap abhi work station pe ho to main aapko ek baar Google Meet ka link share kar raha hun aur main aapko pura mein kaam chal raha hai mera dusra kaam chal raha hai.
Executive: Achcha, achcha. To baaki abhi service aapne bhi recently chaar paanch din pehle hi li hui hai. Leads vagera consume kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Haan kar raha hun. Lekin wo.
Executive: Achcha order order ke regarding hi issue tha mujhe.
Customer: Ji?
Customer: Haan wo number ke regarding hi issue tha mujhe.
Executive: Haan, to number ke regarding aisa issue aapko solve ho gaya sir. Kyunki usme jo number rehta hai na IndiaMART ka number. To abhi main ticket aapka close karunga, right? Aapke paas ek feedback jayega email ID pe to usse aap apna usko yes no ka option rahega. To maine solve kar diya to usko yes ka option aap mark kar sakte ho. Right?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, chalega.
Executive: Baaki isme koi product vagera aapko kuch add vagera karna hai abhi? Mujhe bahut limited product abhi show ho rahe hain aapke sir profile mein.
Customer: Nahi, baad mein karunga sir main.
Executive: Achcha, achcha. Aur kuch inactive bhi mark kiya hai aapne paper box vagera ka. Kuch aapne product apne hand se inactive mark kiya yaani ki wo product ya to out of stock ho gaya aapka ya fir us product mein aap deal nahi karte ho. Invitation cards.
Customer: Haan. Nahi, abhi main usme se deal nahi karta.
Executive: Ji, ji. As a business manager, theek hai na? Mera kaam hai yahan pe profile ki aapko maintain rakhna. Kyunki aapko bataya gaya hoga har product ke score ko 80 plus rakhna hai aapko taaki us product ki visibility market 80 plus.
Customer: 80 plus?
Executive: Haan, har jo ek single single aapka product 26 product, theek hai na? Us single single product ka aapko score 80 above rakhna hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Taaki us product ki visibility aapki market mein bane. Wo aapka tab banega sir jab kam se kam ek product mein aap chaar photos add karoge, theek hai? Product ka naam sahi se rahega, price uska competitive price daloge market ke hisab se, uske specification mention karoge aur description mention karoge. Wo automatic aapka ek product SEO mein chala jayega. Theek hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Usse kya rehta hai aapke jo product ki visibility wo market mein banegi. Uske regarding inquiries aur call aapke paas aayega. Theek hai na? Kyunki by lead to aap consume karoge jo hum aapko week mein de rahe hain 17. Lekin uske alawa bhi jo call inquiry customer aapki profile pe interest show karega direct wala, wo to aapke paas directly hi jayega. Uske regarding by lead connect consume karne ki zarurat hai hi nahi. Bas ek connection pattern aapke chahiye ki aap har product mein apne by lead consume karte raho.
Executive: Theek hai na? Aur regular basis pe aisa nahi ki ek hi din baith ke chaar paanch lead consume kar lo. Sir aapko week ka 17 lead mila hai to daily daily karo kyunki har ghanta lead update hota rehta hai. Aur kya pata kab achcha lead aa jaye. Theek hai? To do do teen teen wo wo dekh raha hun main, dekh raha hun main.
Executive: Baaki isme koi bhi issue aaye in future to mujhe aap iske regarding contact kar sakte hain aur rating reviews ke liye customer se puchhte ho aap?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Rating reviews ke liye?
Customer: Nahi, abhi koi lead vagera nahi aaya hai matlab buyer nahi mila hai abhi tak.
Executive: Achcha buyer nahi mila hai. Fir bhi sir agar customer se baat chit hoti rahe na sir to aap review ka option usko bhejte raho kyunki aap bhi to shopping karte hoge online to mainly rating reviews dekhte hoge usi customer ke sath aap direct contact karte hoge. Same as a profile mein bhi aapke hota hai. Jab aapka response visibility aur rating reviews achcha rahega na to customer automatic aapke paas inquiry send karega. Theek hai na? Uske regarding apni profile mein customer se rating reviews lete rahiye aur by lead consume daily kariye taaki call inquiry uske hisab se aaye aapke paas. Baaki kuch dikkat ho to mere paas aap call kar sakte hain directly.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Main aapka ye jo aapka jo ticket aaya tha wo close kar raha hun aapka. Ticket feedback jayega to feedback kar dijiye, kar dijiye, kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay, thank you.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ji sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's number not showing on 'Buy Now'.

- Wants to know which number to share.



Resolution:

- Explained IndiaMART's unique number system.

- Advised sharing number via message after initial contact.

- Explained how to check PNS number on desktop.

- Suggested saving buyer's number for identification.

- Offered Google Meet to show number display.

- Explained importance of product score and profile maintenance.

- Explained how to improve product visibility.

- Explained benefits of ratings and reviews.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the ticket.

- Customer will receive a feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, pns number, profile, ratings, reviews
